sentences.sContent: They agreed to co-operate with Brazil on a programme to protect the rain forests.
sentences.sCn: 他们同意和巴西合作进行一个保护热带雨林的项目。

sentences.sContent: I advised my client to cooperate fully with the police.
sentences.sCn: 我建议我的当事人要全力与警方配合。

remMethod.val: co(共同) ＋ oper(工作) ＋ ate(做) → 一起工作 → 合作， 协作

words.tran: 合作，协作；[劳经] 协力

trans.tranOther: to work with someone else to achieve something that you both want
